Articles.Content:
[move]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------MrMisquito---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/move]

My first Fighter Jet!

This jet has a long fuel life and goes relatively fast. The first stage is the rocket stage, to take off, the second stage is to drop bombs, and the third stage is to eject. The ejection doesn\'t have a Decoupler, so just pull up sharply and the parachutes will rip off the rest of the rocket (as long as your under 500 feet ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)). it is fairly easy to fly, and takes off around the middle of the runway. If you use it, please give me credit.

![w36m1.png](http://i.imgur.com/w36m1.png)

[glow=red,2,300]DOWNLOAD: [http://www./?46kg5q2q600glci](http://www./?46kg5q2q600glci)[/glow]

[move]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------MrMisquito-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/move]
Welcome to the forums! Not bad for a first fighter jet! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Err, you do know that the flight engines and fuel tanks aren\'t balanced for the rocket ones? Using the rocket fuel tanks with aircraft engines won\'t work in future versions, so it\'s probably a good idea to change them to aviation fuel.
I Live in the present, not the future.
